trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Beaverton
There were no other sightings in Beaverton on or around November 21st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsWhen we arrived home last night, my eldest son pointed at the sky and asked me what it was. There were four lights moving across the sky. I thought at first that they were some kind of bird that was glowing, or fireflies that had been somehow magnified; however, I quickly noticed that they were repeating a pattern. They would meet in the middle and then spread out into four corners. As they spread out, their shape became more oval. They moved fluidly. I had never seen anything like them before and for a moment, I thought they may have been spirit orbs. We observed them for several minutes, then my daughter became frightened and we went inside.
